languages.text: "Не боялся я один. Я постигал и углублялся в тему, как скальпель — в плоть. Я измыслил устройства, что удушают дыхание ирреального, творю оружие, которое повергнет в ужас сам варп, и насыщаю его яростной мощью светил! Я не умею бояться, потому что для меня нет непостижимого, лишь непостигнутое".

"I alone acted without fear. I delved deeper, as a scalpel delves into flesh. I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, I am creating a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble, and I am using the raging power of suns as sustenance for my weapon! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."
languages.original_text: "Не боялся я один. Я постигал и углублялся в тему, как скальпель — в плоть. Я измыслил устройства, что удушают дыхание ирреального, творю оружие, которое повергнет в ужас сам варп, и насыщаю его яростной мощью светил! Я не умею бояться, потому что для меня нет непостижимого, лишь непостигнутое".

traits.locale_text: "I alone acted without fear. I delved deeper as a scalpel sinks into flesh. I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, and one day I will devise a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."

"I alone acted without fear. I delved deeper as a scalpel sinks into flesh. I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, and one day I will devise a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."

"I alone acted without fear. I delved deeper, as a scalpel delves into flesh. I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, I am creating a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble, and I am using the raging power of suns as sustenance for my weapon! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."

I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, I am creating a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble, and I am using the raging power of suns as sustenance for my weapon! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."

"I alone acted without fear. I delved deeper, as a scalpel delves into flesh. I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, I am creating a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble, and I am using the raging power of suns as sustenance for my weapon! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."

languages.text: 「俺だけが、恐れずに行動したのだ。肉体にメスを入れるように、深く掘り進んだ。非現実の吐息を抑制する装置を設計し、歪みそのものを震えさせる兵器を作った。そして、その兵器の動力源として、太陽の荒れ狂う力を利用しているのだ！俺の心には恐怖など、想像を超えるものなどなにもない。すべては想定内だ」
languages.original_text: "I alone acted without fear. I delved deeper, as a scalpel delves into flesh. I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, I am creating a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble, and I am using the raging power of suns as sustenance for my weapon! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."

traits.locale_text: 「俺だけが、恐れずに行動したのだ。肉体にメスを入れるように、深く掘り進んだ。非現実の吐息を抑制する装置を設計し、歪みそのものを震えさせる兵器を作った。そして、その兵器の動力源として、太陽の荒れ狂う力を利用しているのだ！俺の心には恐怖など、想像を超えるものなどなにもない。すべては想定内だ」

languages.text: “只有我一个人毫无畏惧地行动。我深入研究，就像手术刀切入肉体一样。我设置了用来扼杀虚幻气息的装置。至于现在，我正在制作一件武器，它使用恒星狂暴的力量作为燃料，让亚空间本身颤抖不已！我不知道何为恐惧，因为在我心中，没有任何事情是无法理解的。那些看起来无法理解的事情，仅仅是尚未理解而已。”
languages.original_text: "I alone acted without fear. I delved deeper, as a scalpel delves into flesh. I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, I am creating a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble, and I am using the raging power of suns as sustenance for my weapon! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."

traits.locale_text: “只有我一个人毫无畏惧地行动。我深入研究，就像手术刀切入肉体一样。我设置了用来扼杀虚幻气息的装置。至于现在，我正在制作一件武器，它使用恒星狂暴的力量作为燃料，让亚空间本身颤抖不已！我不知道何为恐惧，因为在我心中，没有任何事情是无法理解的。那些看起来无法理解的事情，仅仅是尚未理解而已。”

languages.text: « Je suis le seul à avoir agi sans crainte. J'ai creusé plus profond, comme un scalpel creuse la chair. J'ai conçu des dispositifs capables d'étouffer le souffle de l'irréel, je suis en train de créer une arme qui fera trembler le Warp et j'utilise la puissance des soleils pour l'alimenter ! Je ne connais pas la peur, car selon moi, l'inconcevable n'existe pas. Juste l'inconçu. »
languages.original_text: "I alone acted without fear. I delved deeper, as a scalpel delves into flesh. I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, I am creating a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble, and I am using the raging power of suns as sustenance for my weapon! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis le seul à avoir agi sans crainte. J'ai creusé plus profond, comme un scalpel creuse la chair. J'ai conçu des dispositifs capables d'étouffer le souffle de l'irréel, je suis en train de créer une arme qui fera trembler le Warp et j'utilise la puissance des soleils pour l'alimenter ! Je ne connais pas la peur, car selon moi, l'inconcevable n'existe pas. Juste l'inconçu.

languages.text: «Solo yo actué sin miedo. Profundicé en el asunto como un bisturí penetra en la carne. He diseñado dispositivos que suprimen el hálito de lo irreal. Estoy creando un arma que hará temblar la misma disformidad, ¡usando el poder furioso de los soles como sustento para ella! No conozco el miedo porque para mi mente, lo inconcebible no existe: solo existe lo inconcebido».
languages.original_text: "I alone acted without fear. I delved deeper, as a scalpel delves into flesh. I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, I am creating a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble, and I am using the raging power of suns as sustenance for my weapon! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."

traits.locale_text: «Solo yo actué sin miedo. Profundicé en el asunto como un bisturí penetra en la carne. He diseñado dispositivos que suprimen el hálito de lo irreal. Estoy creando un arma que hará temblar la misma disformidad, ¡usando el poder furioso de los soles como sustento para ella! No conozco el miedo porque para mi mente, lo inconcebible no existe: solo existe lo inconcebido».

languages.text: "Ich allein habe ohne Furcht gehandelt. Ich habe tiefer geschnitten, als ein Skalpell in Fleisch. Ich habe Geräte ersonnen, die unrealer kaum sein könnten. Ich schaffe eine Waffe, die den Warp selbst erzittern lassen wird, und ich nutze die wütende Macht von Sonnen als Nahrung für meine Waffe! Ich kenne keine Furcht, denn in meinem Verstand gibt es nichts Undenkbares ... nur das Unerdachte."
languages.original_text: "I alone acted without fear. I delved deeper, as a scalpel delves into flesh. I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, I am creating a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble, and I am using the raging power of suns as sustenance for my weapon! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."

traits.locale_text: "Ich allein habe ohne Furcht gehandelt. Ich habe tiefer geschnitten, als ein Skalpell in Fleisch. Ich habe Geräte ersonnen, die unrealer kaum sein könnten. Ich schaffe eine Waffe, die den Warp selbst erzittern lassen wird, und ich nutze die wütende Macht von Sonnen als Nahrung für meine Waffe! Ich kenne keine Furcht, denn in meinem Verstand gibt es nichts Undenkbares ... nur das Unerdachte."

languages.text: "Korku duymadan hareket eden yalnızca bendim. Etin içine dalan neşter gibi daha derinlere daldım. Gerçek olmayanın nefesini baskılayan cihazlar tasarladım. Direkt öteboyutu korkudan titretecek bir silah yaratıyor, silahımı beslemesi için de güneşlerin hiddetini kullanıyorum! Ben korku nedir bilmem çünkü benim için anlamlandırılamayan diye bir şey yoktur, yalnızca anlamlandırılmamış vardır."
languages.original_text: "I alone acted without fear. I delved deeper, as a scalpel delves into flesh. I have designed devices that stifle the breath of the unreal, I am creating a weapon that will make the warp itself tremble, and I am using the raging power of suns as sustenance for my weapon! I know no fear, for in my mind, there is no inconceivable — only the unconceived."

traits.locale_text: "Korku duymadan hareket eden yalnızca bendim. Etin içine dalan neşter gibi daha derinlere daldım. Gerçek olmayanın nefesini baskılayan cihazlar tasarladım. Direkt öteboyutu korkudan titretecek bir silah yaratıyorum ve silahımı beslemesi için güneşlerin hiddetini kullanıyorum! Ben korku nedir bilmem çünkü benim için anlamlandırılamayan diye bir şey yoktur, yalnızca anlamlandırılmamış vardır."
